entry.source: This is a job from B's pharmacy. She would{F801}like you to collect {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0} feathers from a demon{F801}called Fuxi. She needs these feathers to make{F801}blankets for the Luxurors. I bet those big{F801}shots would be shocked to find out where the{F801}feathers actually come from!{F801}
